title: Banking Products
description: Welcome to the Banking Products intake portal. Here you can submit new ideas and feature requests for our banking solutions.

sections.title: What We Do
sections.content: We provide core banking infrastructure and solutions that power financial services across the organization.

sections.title: Current Priorities

guidelines.title: Submission Guidelines
items: Clearly define the business problem you're trying to solve
